heading: David finds shelter in the Lord, abides in the Lord’s presence, and keeps his own vows.
verses: Hear my cry, O God; attend unto my prayer.
From the end of the earth will I cry unto thee, when my heart is overwhelmed: lead me to the
For thou hast been a shelter for me,
I will abide in thy tabernacle for ever: I will trust in the covert of thy wings.
For thou, O God, hast heard my
the heritage of those that fear thy name.
Thou wilt prolong the king’s life:
He shall abide before God for ever: O prepare
unto thy name for ever, that I may daily perform my vows.
